description: The goals of the IGVF Data Administrative and Coordinating Center (DACC) are to support the IGVF Consortium by defining and establishing a strategy that connects all participants to the projectâ€™s science. By creating avenues of access that distribute these data to the greater biological research community, the DACC provides a critical connection between scientific producers and consumers.
